EmailTemplate.name: CSO - Hand Off
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell Colleague,
We have received the customer request below and determined that your work group is best suited to handle this customer request.
Please respond to the customer copied on this email directly.
Please leave reference to this Case # in the Subject line of all correspondence to ensure proper routing and tracking.
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
Due to government regulations and/or contractual limitations, all data and/or attachments containing export control information and/or containing details related to Space, Munitions and Missiles items is not authorized for entry or use in our applications or systems at the present time
